Name: Brandy Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.3)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage.
Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish
Review: Cognac works well in this fruit cup, rounding the other ingredients to present as a more harmonious blend when compared to the same recipe made with gin. However, it's more of a winter's cup, without the freshening edge expected of a summer's fruit cup.
History: Created in June 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. For more recipes and history see Fruit Cups and Pimm's .
Nutrition: One serving of Brandy Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.3) contains 214 calories
